title: Two Bedroom legal basement apartment for rent
description:
A recently constructed two-bedroom legal basement apartment available for rent starting April 1st, located at Castle Oaks Crossing and Gore Road in Brampton, Ontario, Canada.
 The tenant will share utilities with the landlord. The tenant will cover 30% of the utilities, including heating, hydro, and water. The internet and cable will not be offered by the landlord.
 The apartment offers:
Separate side door entrance for added privacy
Designated parking spot
Spacious bedrooms with large closets
Open-concept living room with shelves
Full kitchen equipped with relatively new stainless steel appliances: microwave, fridge, and cooking range
Additionally, separate full laundry facilities are included.
 The location provides convenient access to nearby schools and a bus stop just a minute's walk away. A grocery store is within a 5-minute walk, while schools, Hindu Temple, Guru Dhwara, pharmacy, walk-in clinic, salon, and restaurants are a short 5-minute drive away. Easy access to Highway 427 and 407 is just minutes away.
 The minimum lease term is 6 months, with month-to-month thereafter. Applicants are required to submit a job letter, paystubs, job references, and a reference from a previous landlord.
Upon occupancy, the first and last month's rent, along with a key deposit, will be required.
 Young couples with children and working professionals are preferred. Serious inquiries only.

description:
Moving in by May 1! This stunning three-bedroom, two-bathroom townhouse apartment offers unparalleled privacy as the end unit. Spanning two stories, it boasts soaring 9-foot ceilings throughout and expansive windows in each bedroom, flooding the space with natural light. The basement features two ensuite bedrooms, while the main floor includes a bedroom with sliding glass door that can serve as a dining room as well, alongside a modern kitchen and inviting living room.
The kitchen showcases upgraded designer Italian-manufactured cabinetry, while the bathrooms feature contemporary Italian-manufactured vanities with premium porcelain slab countertops, upgraded shower ceilings, and sleek frameless doors. Bedrooms in the basement offer ensuite bathrooms and walk-in closets, ensuring comfort and convenience.
Included with the apartment is underground parking. Situated in the vibrant Willowdale East neighborhood, residents enjoy proximity to cultural amenities such as the Toronto Centre for the Performing Arts, Mel Lastman Square, the Douglas Snow Aquatic Centre, movie theaters, the North York Public Library, and two subway stations.
Includes: Stainless Steel Fridge, Stove, B/I Dishwasher, Built-In Microwave, Washer, Dryer. All Elf's, Window Coverings. Tenants agree to the report to the Landlord Credit Bureau and for landlord to verify the credit and background information. Tenants are responsible for all utilities. description: The apartment is located on the 2nd floor of 148 Keewatin Avenue in Uptown Toronto. It will be available on April 1st, 2024. title: Downtown 2 Bedroom Condo For Rent
address: 158 Front St E, Toronto, ON M5A 0K9
description:
Wake up, to the sun rising, in this 19th storey condo with a fantastic eastern view of the city.
On the 14th floor the building divides into twin towers and between these towers is an outdoor pool and lounge with absolutely breathtaking views north and south to the lake.
On the 10th floor is a large outdoor BBQ pit and patio facing towards the lake and indoors is a large party room for all tenants to enjoy.
There are also a library and a place to shoot a game of pool. There is a fully equipped 2 storey gymnasium. Scheduled classes in yoga that you can join and I’ve seen notices in the elevator that suggest there are other activities as well.
The condominium is located at the intersection of Sherbourne and Front st East. There is a Cobbs bakery and a nail salon and more retail space not yet leased at ground level.
There is everything you need a within walking distance, St Lawrence Market 5 minutes, the lake and it’s boardwalk 10 minutes, the distillery district 15 minutes. Canadian Opera Company 5 minute walk. Bars, restaurants, theatres, pastry shops, clothing stores, fast food, supermarkets and anything else you need ! Always something to do if you’re bored.
The concierge personnel are always courteous and ready to assist if needed. The management also keeps a close eye out for persons using their condos as AIR BNB as it is strictly prohibited !!
There is quite a diverse population, people from all over the world living here under one roof and you would think that most people do find it to be a very friendly atmosphere!!! It really is a cool place to live.
Parking is available if necessary!
Storage space frequently becomes available on building link which is an on-line form of communication between tenants and u can look for a variety of services. You can also voice complaints and communicate for services required from condo management!
This apt is a long term rental, minimum one year lease required.

title: 2 bedroom 2 bathroom
description:
Hello everyone‍♀️
We're renting out our 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in Downtown due to relocation.
(includes parking and locker).
The area is really cool (and most importantly, very quiet for Toronto). You get the downtown vibe but in a peaceful setting. It's on Logan Street, surrounded by private houses, lots of cafes, restaurants, and great transportation options.
The balcony offers a view of the CN Tower and the entire city.
The building is brand new, we're the first occupants, everything is in perfect condition. Parking and locker are included in the price. There's a gym, coworking space, barbecue area, and outdoor relaxation zone.
Two bedrooms, one master bedroom (with ensuite bathroom), and the other separate from the bathroom. Can be used as a bedroom or office, whatever you prefer.
Landlords are great, quick to respond to any questions or requests, and hands-off if everything is okay
If you want to see the apartment, message me privately.
You'll need to pay the first and last month's rent. Of course, you need to be employed and provide at least two paystubs, a letter from your employer, and a credit score report.

title: 165 Jameson Ave - 165 Jameson Ave Apartment for Rent
description: Welcome to 165 Jameson Avenue, located in trendy Parkdale near Liberty Village. Your new community is packed with specialty shops, great restaurants, bars, and boutiques. There are public schools, private schools, and Catholic schools nearby and the 501 streetcar and the 24 -hour Queen Street streetcar easily connects you to downtown Toronto in minutes. Enjoy easy access to the Gardiner Expressway if you prefer to commute by car. Your home is a short walk away from the fabulous galleries and nightlife of Queen West, the trendsetting shops of Liberty Village, and the impressive restaurants of Roncesvalles Village. The CNE, BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium are all near your new neighbourhood. When you need to recharge in nature, stroll on the waterfront trail along Lake Ontario to High Park – the largest park in the city.

title: 1+1 Bedroom, Utilities Incl. Available April 1
address: Waverly St S, Oshawa, ON L1J 5V3
description:
1+1 Bedroom Basement, Utilities Included
Hello Future Renter!
Available for April 1, 2024, our beautifully renovated Basement Apartment is perfect for a young couple, working professional or a mature student.
Entire Apartment has been updated with new flooring, baseboards and doors throughout the space. Upon Entry, you will find convenient coat hooks, a floating shelf for your hats and gloves and a bench that folds up. Special feature: move in your long pieces of furniture using the pass-through located under the bench!
Follow the white block feature wall down the stairs (which has a sturdy, yet removable railing to make move-in day super easy) to the Kitchen! Newly installed cabinets allow for lots of counter space and plenty of drawers. In addition, there is a pantry directly off the kitchen with shelving and additional storage space. (And if that’s not enough, you’ll find additional storage under the stairs - Harry Potter would be jealous!) The kitchen passthrough makes it easy to entertain your guests while prepping in the kitchen (or, let’s be honest, will allow you to watch TV while you cook!).
Walk under the Raw Wood Beams into the Living Room/Dining Room, which is very spacious with lots of light. There’s enough floor space to dance like no one’s watching (and lucky for you, there are wood blinds you can close to make sure no one does!)
Down the Hallway, you’ll find a small Den/Office on the left, in-suite Laundry on the right and the Master Bedroom* straight ahead. The master is quite spacious and could even allow an additional workspace if needed. These rooms are awaiting your touch to make them special!
Finally, the 3 Piece Bathroom has a new vanity, standing shower (sorry, no tub) and a toilet. 2 reclaimed wood shelves and 3 hooks are provided along with a linen closet in the hall.
As for location, this is a great one! 5 minute walk to the Oshawa Centre, Grocery Store, Trent University, Civic Centre and Go Bus Stop. 10 minute drive to the Go Station, 401, Lowes, Walmart, Starbucks and Banking.
Additional Info:
1 Parking Space available
Non-smoking
Dogs welcome
Shared Backyard
Private Laundry
Rent is $1800 per month, all utilities included. (Including Internet.) Please bring proof of income and 2-3 references when viewing.
So, if you’re interested, give us a shout! We’d love to meet you!
Room measurements:
Living Room: 20’ x 10’ 6”
Kitchen: 13’ x 8’ 7”
Master Bedroom: 18’ 10” x 8’ 6”
Den/Office: 9’ 3” x 6’ 10”

title: 2Bdr 2 Bath Condo
address: 2442 Old Bronte Rd, Oakville, ON L6M 4J2
description:
Oakville Branch Condos
2442 Old Bronte Rd
This is a beautifully designed Condo building showcasing class and elegance throughout.
The condo unit is a 2 bedroom 2 bath , 810sqft space with 9ft ceilings. It faces onto the courtyard. The lay out is ideal for a family or shared accommodation as the bedrooms reside on either side of the condo and each have their own private bathroom. The master bedroom has a very large walk in closet, the second bedroom can easily accommodate a king size bed ot 2 smaller beds for children . It has an adjacent bathroom with large soaker tub.
This unit has a huge 140sqft balcony, largest in the complex, and the only floor in the building that is equipped with gas lines to allow a BBQ on the patio.
The gym is beautiful with everything you need to keep fit, there is a yoga room under construction that will provide classes once completed.
The pool area is stunning, still under construction, will be on par with any high end spa facility. It is equipped with a spa like pool, adjacent hot tub, rain room, and steam room area. In the summer doors open to a deck to be able to take in the sun by the pool.
Other ammenities include 24 hour concierge, a car wash area, a pet wash room, bike stands, landscaped courtyard with BBQ's, a beautiful kitchen that opens to the courtyard that can be used in the summer to impress your guests, as well through out the building there are more areas that are comparable to resort like ammenities. Large shared working space, pool table, indoor party room. All absolutely beautiful.
It's situated in South Oakville with convenient access to 407, 403, QEW.
It is close to OTM Hospital, Bronte Go station, Sheridan College, Banks, Groceries, schools, Shopping, Transit. Hiking trails, and Bronte Creek P.P.

title: New 2-bedroom Basement Unit in Oakville Available from May 1
description:
Descriptions: This newly renovated 2-bedroom legal basement unit with lots of windows has a separate walkout entrance facing to a beautiful ravine backyard. The house is located between Trafalgar and QEW, close to Oakville Mall and walking distance to Sheridan college Trafalgar campus.
The brand new large unit (~900 square feet) consists of 2 bed rooms, living room, eat-in kitchen, one bathroom, and laundry. Soundproof ceiling was installed for the totally independent basement unit. A new patio is being built at the entrance of the unit with a beautiful ravine backyard. You could reach me at 416-557-8283 for further information.
Tenant qualification: Looking for tenants with a small and quiet family. The potential tenants need to provide employment letter, 2 pay stubs, credit report, references, and rental application. No smoking/vaping and no pets are permitted. Please prepare the above documents before you view.
Prices and terms: The unit is for rent at $1,950. Tenants pay 1/3 utilities and hydro, water, gas and hot water tank. Tenant insurance must be purchased. Minimum of one-year lease is required and long term leasing is preferred. The unit is available from May 1.

The building also features 24 hr security and visitor parking.

En suite Laundry,
Hillcrest Condos – 145 Hillcrest Ave.
Hillcrest condos are located near Cooksville GO station. This adds to the popularity of these older condo buildings built by Tridel in Mississauga with larger rooms. 145 Hillcrest Ave condos were built in 1988
Hillcrest Condos for Rent – Features & Reviews:
There are no balconies in these four Hillcrest condo buildings. However, the suites come with solarium's which provide a feeling of openness. Monthly condo maintenance fee includes common element maintenance, heat, hydro and water. Hydro is included which is unique to a few condo buildings only in Mississauga.
Hillcrest condo buildings provide amenities like exercise room, recreation room, sauna, security guard, security system and squash/racket court. 145 Hillcrest condos have a tennis court as well. But there is no swimming pool. Hillcrest condos are mostly pet friendly buildings.
Hillcrest – Making sense of Renting condos
Hillcrest condo buildings benefit from its AAA location and proximity to the Cooksville GO. Cooksville GO station has plans for a major revamp in the coming years. The condos are quite popular with people who take the GO train or bus and commute to downtown Toronto for work. Hillcrest buildings are also popular with students attending University of Toronto or Ryerson university. Investors like to buy at Hillcrest as these condos are in high demand for renting. Many Hillcrest condo suites have been upgraded or refurbished as these are the condos
Local stores, restaurants, pharmacy, groceries and Tim Hortons are just a short walk away. Hillcrest buildings are just minutes to the Square One shopping center, theaters, restaurants, Trillium hospital, parks and schools. Nearby Thomas L Kennedy Secondary School is among one of the top schools in Mississauga. There is an easy access to highways 401, 403 and the QEW.

The house is in the King West neighborhood, steps from the downtown core and subway. With the downtown dominated by glassy new condos, this centrally located house is a rare find. The unit available (only 4 total in the building - no elevators necessary!) boasts high living room ceilings and windows with sweeping views of the park to the south and your own private patio to the north. This unit will go fast.
Free Parking Onsite Incl. (valued at $375/mth)

title: 2 Bed 2 Bath Condo - Scarborough
description:
A newly constructed condominium is available for rent in the Markham and Ellesmere area of Scarborough. It's conveniently located just a 15-minute walk from Centennial College Progress Campus and Scarborough Town Centre, and a 20-minute walk from the University of Toronto Scarborough Campus. Nearby amenities include elementary and high schools, as well as a grocery store, pharmacy, and doctors' office within a 10-minute walk.
This penthouse apartment offers a 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom layout with in-unit laundry facilities. It comes fully equipped with brand new appliances, including laundry machines, dryer, fridge, microwave, dishwasher, and electric stove. Enjoy the comfort of in-unit AC and heating. Both bathrooms feature showers, with one connected as an en suite to the master bedroom, which also includes a bathtub. Floor-to-ceiling windows in the bedrooms and living areas provide abundant natural light, and the master bedroom's balcony offers a picturesque view.
Residents of this apartment complex have access to amenities such as a gym, yoga studio, and cafe. With 24-hour security, you can rest assured in a safe living environment. Located in a sought-after neighborhood, this building is an excellent housing option.
Open to students and families (multiple if necessary).

title: Large 1 bedroom - High Park / Swansea
description:
Welcome to your new home in the sought-after High Park/Swansea neighbourhood of Toronto! This charming one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. Nestled in a cozy 5-plex, it provides a warm, community feel.
As you step inside, you'll find a well-appointed kitchen, perfect for cooking up your favorite meals. The living space is inviting, ideal for relaxation and personal time. The bedroom is a comfortable retreat after a long day.
For your convenience, the building includes laundry facilities in the basement. If you have a car, off-street parking is available for an additional $100 per month.
Priced at $2,200 monthly, this rental includes all utilities, making budgeting easier for you.
Location is key, and this apartment shines with its proximity to essential amenities. You're within walking distance to the subway and streetcar, making commuting a breeze. Enjoy leisurely strolls to Bloor West Village, where shopping, restaurants, and gyms await. And for those quick getaways or commutes, you're just minutes from the Gardiner Expressway and Lakeshore.
Embrace the vibrant lifestyle that this High Park/Swansea gem has to offer!
